Method.name: DateTimeDiff
Method.Implementation: if $get(date1)=""||($get(date2)="") quit "" if $get(time1)="" set time1=0 if $get(time2)="" set time2=0 if $get(interval)="" set interval="s" set res=0 set secday=24*60*60 if (date2-date1)>1 set res=res+((date2-date1-1)*secday)+(secday-time1+time2) if (date2-date1)=1 set res=res+(secday-time1+time2) if date1=date2 set res=res+time2-time1 if interval="m" set res=res\60 if interval="h" set res=res\3600 if interval="d" set res=res\secday quit res
